article_title: Meyers Glaros Group managing partner earns industry honor

og.description: SCHERERVILLE | Willis H. Glaros, managing partner of Meyers Glaros Group, has been named the Employee Benefits Association 2014 Advisor of the Year.
og.title: Meyers Glaros Group managing partner earns industry honor
